maize
Class StateBot

java.lang.Object
  maize.AdvancedBot
      maize.StateBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bot
public abstract class StateBot
extends AdvancedBot

This bot is abstract and should be extended to create your own bots. Using the calls of Advanced bot, Stack bot allows you to maintain a simple state.

See Also:
AdvancedBot

          Variable which can be used to keep simple state

Method Detail

setState

protected void setState(int state)
Sets the state of the bot. Can be any arbitrary number mapped to any constant that is user defined.

Parameters:
state - New state

getState

protected int getState()
Gets the current state of the bot.

Returns:

makeMove

public abstract void makeMove(boolean[][] view,
                              int x,
                              int y,
                              int o,
                              int fx,
                              int fy)
This function should contain control logic for the bot. Abstract function to be overloaded by bots.

Overrides:
makeMove in class AdvancedBot
Parameters:
view - View matric from the perspective of the bot, orientated so the top of the matrix is facing the same direction as the bot.
x - X coord of the bot.
y - Y coord of the bot.
o - Orientation of the bot @see Orientation
fx - X coord of the finish.
fy - Y coord of the finish.
See Also:
Bot
